name: Console Warz
blurb: 3 player Co-Op.\nBecome a games console and use your video-game powers to battle censorship, piracy and other enemies of video-games.

rewards.reward: Gold Coin\r\n==============================\r\nThanks for your support. even the smallest Pledges help. We bestow onto you an open invitation to join us Facebook and Twitter and later invite you to join us for our live streams of the development of Console Warz

10 Rings\r\n==============================\r\nConsider this your pre-order of Console Warz + Receive an invitation to any and all Beta phases for Console Warz + Receive a Kickstarter exclusive digital art pack for Console Warz + Receive the feeling of satisfaction that comes with being an awesome person that is helping dreams become reality (subject to availability).
Rocket launcher\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Receive 2 extra copies of the game so you can enjoy the 3 player Co-Op experience with your friends.

Mushroom\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous rewards + Upgrade your version of the game to the Kickstarter special edition of the game which includes bones content only available to you as a Major Kickstarter Backer + Become one of the elites and get your name carved forever in the digital stone of the game credits as a Major backer on Kickstarter.

A\u0336n\u0336g\u0336r\u0336y\u0336.....Early Bird Special\r\n==========================\r\nGet the \u00a350 tier Mushroom reward + for getting the worm you will be upgraded to the \u00a3100 tier Rapid Fire reward

Rapid fire\r\n==============================\r\nAll Previous rewards + Have your questions prioritized on our first set of live stream events from within the studio. We want your opinions heard and for you to be a part of our studio.

Pink Fairy\r\n==========================\r\nAll previous non limited rewards + Get a golden ticket which grants you free access to any and all of our content that we release for Console Warz forever. + Receive a digital copy of the Console Warz official soundtrack.

Gold Star\r\n==========================\r\nAll previous non limited rewards + Become a BlueBlaze Studio Elite member which grants you access to all of our games, supporting content for those games and priority access to the beta phases of our upcoming titles over the next 5 years

Purple weapon
==========================
All previous non limited rewards + Receive an invitation to come and visit us in our studio for the day, get our one one one V.I.P treatment and see the game development in action first hand + Let us Celebrate your existence as an awesome human being by giving you the title of Demigod in the credits of the game.

(Unfortunately we are unable to pay for transportation or accommodation but can offer you special access to the team via Skype for a one on one conversation if you are unable to make to the studio in person.)

Invincibility\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous non limited rewards + Receive 1 of 50  limited edition character statue packs containing 3 of the main Console Warz Characters, numbered and signed by the creators of the game and a commemorative plaque.

BFG\r\n==========================\r\nAll previous non limited rewards + Get the opportunity to work with us in designing, creating and naming one of the Kickstarter exclusive equipable Items for Console Warz. The content that you will be a part of creating will be a major part of the game and so you will be invited to work with us In house or remotely and have your achievement acknowledged in the game credits where you will be listed as a member of the design team for all to see (Transport and accommodation not included).

Infinite ammo\r\n==========================\r\nAll previous non limited rewards + Receive an Invitation to work with us to Design one of the enemy types that players will be slaughtering in Console Warz. Help us define the visual style of the enemy character, voice the character, define how the character will behave in the game and create a special attack for the Enemy type (Transport and accommodation not included). + receive a world exclusive 1 of a kind model of the character you create and the rights to reproduce and sell the model that you were a fundamental part of creating + have your achievement acknowledged in the game credits where you will be listed as a member of the design team for all to see.

Level Up\r\n==========================\r\nAll previous non limited rewards + Become a member of Blublaze studio and the Console Warz development team.. Explore a career in video game development and gain valuable work experience during the course of a 1 month internship with Blueblaze Studio, which may lead to an extended position at the studio. Work on Console Warz During this period and Receive all the recognition for the work that you do in the credits of the game. It is required that you work on location at the studio in person for the duration of the internship and you will be given the same treatment as other team members (Transport and accommodation not included).
